translations: 内野；耕地；农宅周围的田园

sentences.sentence: Figo came infield from the left to score.
sentences.translation: 菲戈从左侧向场中心移动以求得分。

sentences.sentence: He put six fielders on the right side of the infield.
sentences.translation: 他将6名接球手安排在内场的右侧。

sentences.sentence: Farrell raced up the right touchline, dodged infield and curled a shot with his left foot.
sentences.translation: 法雷尔跑向右边线，向内场闪躲，左脚射出一弧线球。
